ygData.messageBody:
According to James Dwyer:
> As far as being in a group, many many people appreciate my help as a
> wizard. I also have seen many people asking for magic user help. I guess
> they are starting to learn that all the mages are good for something!
> Unfortunately, I often see them telling me to "BLAST" "BLAST" in the
> midst of battle when my better judgement tells me that I will get mobbed
> if I do so quick. My response of course, "Dark Elf is about to die."

The answer is, of course to group with people who appreciate wizardry,
and know when to defer to you for tactical combat.

I often put in blasts *during* combat. But I count how many blows the big
tanks does, and rarely fire one off before he's done almost as much as I
do. Exception being when he's dropping in life, then I move away, nuke,
nuke as fast as possible. When the mob switches focus to me, I suffer
the blows (and practice my combat :) while he finishes it.
